zodiacSigns.name: Aries
zodiacSigns.description: Aries is the first sign of the zodiac, symbolized by the ram. They are known for their leadership qualities and adventurous spirit.

zodiacSigns.name: Taurus
zodiacSigns.description: Taurus is represented by the bull. They are known for their reliability, patience, and love for beauty and comfort.

zodiacSigns.name: Gemini
zodiacSigns.description: Gemini is symbolized by the twins. They are known for their adaptability, communication skills, and curiosity.

zodiacSigns.name: Cancer
zodiacSigns.description: Cancer is represented by the crab. They are known for their emotional depth, intuition, and nurturing nature.

zodiacSigns.name: Leo
zodiacSigns.description: Leo is symbolized by the lion. They are known for their confidence, creativity, and charisma.

zodiacSigns.name: Virgo
zodiacSigns.description: Virgo is represented by the maiden. They are known for their analytical skills, attention to detail, and practicality.

zodiacSigns.name: Libra
zodiacSigns.description: Libra is symbolized by the scales. They are known for their sense of balance, harmony, and strong social skills.

zodiacSigns.name: Scorpio
zodiacSigns.description: Scorpio is represented by the scorpion. They are known for their intensity, passion, and resourcefulness.

zodiacSigns.name: Sagittarius
zodiacSigns.description: Sagittarius is symbolized by the archer. They are known for their adventurous spirit, optimism, and love for freedom.

zodiacSigns.name: Capricorn
zodiacSigns.description: Capricorn is represented by the goat. They are known for their discipline, ambition, and practicality.

zodiacSigns.name: Aquarius
zodiacSigns.description: Aquarius is symbolized by the water bearer. They are known for their innovation, independence, and humanitarianism.

zodiacSigns.name: Pisces
zodiacSigns.description: Pisces is represented by the fish. They are known for their empathy, intuition, and artistic nature.
